group_1.textCenter: Good job, everyone. You all worked hard today.
Even though you should be able to recover your@strength with magic...
You must be mentally fatigued,@so have a good rest today.

group_1.textLeft: Nice work, everyone♪

group_1.textRight: Y'know, Miyuri just texted me.
She said the Feather girls' training was completed,@no prob.

group_1.textLeft: Good. I suppose I can count on Miyu to take care@of the Feathers tomorrow as well.
Hey guys, why don't we all stop by the cafe?@'Cause this cutie's in the mood for some sweets!

group_1.textRight: What?@Ah, yes...

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, Miwarin and Sasha, you too!

group_1.textRight: Ehh...?@I... dunno what to do...

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*♪@Instructor, you're coming with us, right?
I'll pass. Have fun with the others.

group_1.textRight: Huh...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, and you've got another day tomorrow,@so don't go overboard.
Well, I'll see you all tomorrow.
I don't know if you can call it a "gap", though...@I was just the same as I've always been.

group_1.textRight: Are you for real? You'd never say that sorta stuff@normally, y'know?
Like, "I'd TOTALLY hate it!", or like,@"Welp... Bye-bye!",[chara:102800:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102800:cheek_0][chara:102800:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:102800:lipSynch_1] yeah?

group_1.textCenter: (What am I going to do? About that thing Princess@and the others saw...)
(I'm sure even Sasha and Miwa are being told@about this by now...)

group_1.textRight: Hellooo, Instructor!
Just came after you to ask you some questions, lol.

group_1.textLeft: (...They heard about that thing from Her Highness@and the others after all?!)

group_1.textRight: I wouldn't want to stand around talking,@so why don't we go into the store for a minute?

group_1.textLeft: ...Sure...
...So, er... what is it that you want to ask me...?

group_1.textRight: Um, we were wondering if you could give us a@recommendation for a voluntary training program.

group_1.textLeft: ...What?

group_1.textRight: ...Seeing everyone working so hard, I thought...
Just because I was in the hospital doesn't mean@I can stay all cozy forever...
I also wanna get strong as soon as possible.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:103101:cheek_0][chara:103101:motion_301][chara:103101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:103101:eyeClose_1][chara:103101:lipSynch_1]*Sigh*...

group_1.textRight: ...Uh, what, I can't...?

group_1.textLeft: No, that's not what I meant!@I was just talking to myself...
Alright, I see Miwa's reasoning, but what about you,@Sasha?

group_1.textRight: I know my role might be separate,
but having a different training from everyone else@makes me feel kind of bad...
So, I just wanted to ask you if there was@anything else I could do.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
(Both of them seem to be serious.)
In that case, I'll message you with a program@for your voluntary training.
Challenge yourself with it if you like.

group_1.textRight: Thanks, Instructor!

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh yeah, why don't you go observe Miyu and the@others' training tomorrow?
There might be something to be grasped@by watching the way other girls battle.

group_1.textRight: Then we shall do so♪
...You're kind after all, Instructor.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, you're really considerate of everyone.
I'm merely trying to strengthen everyone@for the sake of Neo-Magius's goal...
For the sake of spreading Magical Girl supremacy.@That is all.
(The reason I'm too hard on you all sometimes...)
(May be that I have high expectations@for you guys...)

group_1.textRight: Hey, I wanted to ask...
Instructor, how come you're an "instructor"?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, it all started when I was teaching the Feathers@in the Wings of the Magius...

group_1.narration: Mifuyu, who recruited me@to join the Wings of the Magius,@saw my potential and selected me.
To support the Magius' activities,@we needed a strong force,@so every day I would strictly instruct the Feathers.

group_1.textLeft: It's just... at that time...
They were afraid of how strict I was, to a degree@that's normally unbelievable...

group_1.textRight: So that's how you got the nickname of@"Demon Instructor"...
Indeed, since there's a gap between that and@your usual cool-headed image, right?

group_1.textLeft: ...A gap, huh...

group_1.textCenter: (Was, at its roots, an accident caused by@this "gap"...)
(...And yet, I lashed out at them just because I was@embarrassed; how pathetic.)
(Tomorrow, I'll apologize to Her Highness and@the rest...)
Enough of this chit-chat,@go home and get some rest.
